Megatron:






"I have tried to reason with that fool Rampage," he said. "He declined and 
fired on me." He walked to the side. "We have to reunite the Predacons as a 
whole again. And I need the other's help." He glared and mused at Scorpnok 
and Dark Mouse. "Dark Mouse, are you able to hail th' Alliance base?"
